data.title: StringFast: Fast Code to Compute CMB Power Spectra induced by Cosmic Strings
data.name: StringFast
data.description: A fast code to compute CMB power spectra induced by a network of cosmic strings

evidence: "This code allows the user to calculate TT, EE, and BB power spectra... for 'wiggly' cosmic strings" (domain-specific scientific computation).
"It is written as a Fortran 90 module... See the header of the source file for usage instructions." (source-centric distribution, no mention of package managers or binaries).

"The tarball contains: `stringfast.f90`, the main source file; ... `driver.f90`, a small driver program illustrating a simple use of the module; and a Makefile for the driver program." (users compile/run from provided source).
